titleStmt.title: Certaine wholesome obseruations and rules fo [sic] inne-keepers, and also for their guests meet to be fixed vpon the wall of euery chamber in the house, but meant more especially for the good of Mr. Henry Hunter and his wife, of Smithfield, his louing brother and sister, and of the guests which vse their house.
titleStmt.author: T. W.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
